Key Match Events: Van Lam made three important saves in the first half
Van Lam made two more amazing saves in the second half but could not prevent a last-minute goal
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Troussier used many young players in the match
Young players were given opportunities and expected to learn from the experience
Post-Match Reflections: Van Lam and Que Ngoc Hai regretted the last-minute defeat but saw positive aspects in the young players' performances
Vietnam still confident despite the loss and aims to improve in the next matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended with a 0-1 loss to Iraq
Iraq started strongly and created high pressure early in the match
